description: Cohesive representation of Link City's eight major factions. Used for global context, inter-sect logic, district influence, soul interactions, and UI theming.

sects.name: The Iron Monolith
doctrine: All systems must be shattered to reveal truth.
Order is violence disguised as safety.
Collapse is the only honest architecture.

soul_interactions.description: How this sect perceives / treats the player souls

Adrian.view: useful trash — a pawn that can be broken and remade
Adrian.flavor: They watch him like vultures sizing up roadkill.

Evangeline.view: fragile ornament — pretty, but irrelevant to real entropy
Evangeline.flavor: They would enjoy watching her carefully constructed life unravel.

Rosalynn.view: already half-broken — almost beautiful in her damage
Rosalynn.flavor: A few Monolith lieutenants feel strange kinship with her scars.

sects.name: The Silver Arbiters
doctrine: Chaos is cruelty wearing freedom's mask.
Every soul must fit its assigned place.

Adrian.view: unruly variable — must be bound or excised
Adrian.flavor: They already have three provisional arrest warrants drafted in his name.

Evangeline.flavor: She receives quiet invitations to 'alignment seminars'.

Rosalynn.view: damaged component — candidate for structured repair
Rosalynn.flavor: They offer mandatory 'rehabilitation protocols' she keeps refusing.

sects.name: The Hourglass Cult
doctrine: The future is already written in royalty's hand.
Resistance is just foreplay to surrender.

Adrian.flavor: They bet on exactly when he'll break.

Evangeline.view: tragic figure — her timeline is already tragic poetry
Evangeline.flavor: A few courtiers write odes to her inevitable fall.

Rosalynn.flavor: They want her scrubbed from the record entirely.

sects.name: The Void Cartographers
doctrine: Everything belongs in its assigned void.

Adrian.flavor: They've already drafted his exile coordinates.

Evangeline.view: properly placed asset — stays in her zone
Evangeline.flavor: She is granted safe passage through most checkpoints.

Rosalynn.view: glitch in the grid — must be isolated
Rosalynn.flavor: Multiple containment proposals are pending approval.

sects.name: The Neon Thorns
doctrine: Grow or rot — there is no third option.

Adrian.view: raw potential — needs a few mods to really bloom
Adrian.flavor: They keep offering him free (dangerous) upgrades.

Evangeline.view: beautiful but wilting — must be saved from herself
Evangeline.flavor: Evangeline is their favorite 'before/after' project fantasy.

Rosalynn.view: already blooming in decay — darkly inspiring
Rosalynn.flavor: Some Thorns call her 'the perfect hybrid' behind her back.

Adrian.view: loud, temporary noise — will quiet eventually
Adrian.flavor: They speak of him in the patient tense.

Evangeline.view: curious bloom — how long until she accepts closure?
Evangeline.flavor: A few Gardeners leave her single black roses as invitations.

Rosalynn.flavor: They offer her painless transitions more often than threats.

sects.name: The Stitched Asylum
doctrine: If it can be imagined, it must bleed into reality.
Perfection is boring; atrocity is art.

Adrian.view: delightful new toy — needs a few more stitches
Adrian.flavor: They keep sending him 'presents' that move on their own.

Evangeline.view: porcelain doll waiting to be improved
Evangeline.flavor: Multiple 'customization' sketches of her exist in their ateliers.

Rosalynn.view: already a masterpiece of suffering — collectible
Rosalynn.flavor: Some members want to preserve her exactly as she is forever.

sects.name: The Unbound
district_control: None — nomadic / glitch zones / dead channels

Adrian.flavor: They trust him more than most tethered souls.

Evangeline.flavor: They leave her anonymous messages offering escape.

Rosalynn.view: living proof the system can be survived
Rosalynn.flavor: She is their quiet icon — the girl who shouldn't exist.

global_tensions.description: Cross-faction relationship modifiers and narrative logic hooks

active_conflicts.state: cold war → open skirmishes in shared border zones
active_conflicts.modifier: Any character wearing opposing badges receives -20 social in contested districts
Presence of both sigils in same scene triggers immediate hostility checks
Unbound characters suffer -15 to any interaction involving time-based prophecy or debt
Asylum creations have 30% chance to be auto-contained when entering Cartographer zones

universal_anomaly_effect.rule: All Primordial-aligned sects suffer -40% detection / tracking accuracy against confirmed Unbound members
